name: Krav Trade
description: At Krav, we're all about creating a robust DeFi infrastructure where you, whether as a trader or a liquidity provider (LP), can truly thrive. If you're a trader, you'll love how you can use altcoins such as PEPE as collateral to open long or short positions on Bitcoin (BTC). And if you're an LP, you'll appreciate the steady income from transaction fees every time a trade happens.
